typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	p1 as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		{Original Size} as string,
		{Corrected Size} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		lkp_Original_Size as string,
		lkp_Corrected_Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select Original_Size as lkp_Original_Size ,Corrected_Size as lkp_Corrected_Size from dbo.tire_size_SCD',
	format: 'query') ~> source2
source(output(
		join_key as integer,
		max_sk as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 1 as join_key,coalesce(max(Sk_tire_size),0) as max_sk from tire_size_SCD',
	format: 'query') ~> source3
source1, source2 join({Original Size} == lkp_Original_Size,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
AlterRow1 derive(create_date = currentTimestamp(),
		update_date = currentTimestamp(),
		change_ind = 'Y') ~> DerivedColumn1
Join1 split(not(isNull({Original Size}))&&trim(rtrim(ltrim({Corrected Size})))!=trim(rtrim(ltrim(coalesce(lkp_Corrected_Size,'0')))),
	not(isNull({Original Size}))&&not(isNull(lkp_Original_Size))&&ltrim(rtrim(trim({Original Size})))==ltrim(rtrim(trim(lkp_Original_Size)))&&trim(rtrim(ltrim({Corrected Size})))!=trim(rtrim(ltrim(coalesce(lkp_Corrected_Size,'0')))),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Insert, Update)
AlterRow2 derive(update_date = currentTimestamp(),
		change_ind = 'N') ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		{Original Size},
		{Corrected Size},
		Original_Size = lkp_Original_Size,
		update_date,
		change_ind
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ConditionalSplit1@Insert alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Update alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Sk_tire_size as integer,
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string,
		change_ind as string,
		create_date as timestamp,
		update_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.tire_size_SCD OFF;'],
	postSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.tire_size_SCD ON;'],
	mapColumn(
		Original_Size = {Original Size},
		Corrected_Size = {Corrected Size},
		change_ind,
		create_date,
		update_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
Select1 sink(input(
		Sk_tire_size as integer,
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string,
		change_ind as string,
		create_date as timestamp,
		update_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Original_Size'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Original_Size,
		update_date,
		change_ind
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
